website_summaries.verdict: Nerf quality guns, but with lasers rather than foam bullets.
pros: Players love the sounds and lights of these guns
Plus, you can actually "reload" with the slide and recoil
cons: Some issues with guns not responding to hits
Some are more sensitive than others

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I played and had a lot of fun running around the house playing
customer_reviews.text: Just got these for Christmas, couldn't wait to try them out! My daughter and I played and had a lot of fun running around the house playing. They work really well for us! *UPDATE 6/23/2015- these are so fun so we bought 6 of them so our whole family can play!! It's a good workout running in and out around and through the house! We use rechargeable batteries and haven't had to change them since last Christmas! We love to play this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: lmjharper

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot more fun than I anticipated. I also anticipated the batteries to last a little longer, but given how theres lights, sound, and physical feedback in these, I can't complain. Although, be prepared to chew through 6 batteries at a time per gun. When the batteries start to run low, you can tell, as you'll not be able to hit opponents to save your life. Even still, 8 year old loved these, and I enjoy playing with him.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Smack the top if no shaking.
customer_reviews.text: If one or both guns doesn't shake when you shoot it, just give it a whack on top. I had one that didn't shake (haptic feedback?) and I tapped the top and loosened the solenoid. After the first "unsticking" it continued to work fine. You also might want to use duct tape to make a pinhole on the front lens. Without the tape, I could hold the 2 pistols with my arms outstretched. The were facing away from each other and still registering hits. The tape seems to have fixed that problem. It might have cut the range down too though. They're fun. I'm keeping mine.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets of these for the kids. They loved them so so much. They played all afternoon and until well after dark. Mixed ages from 5-14. And no one got hurt. Good for outdoor fun. Takes 6 AA batteries each, but they lasted at least all day. Then they took them home, so I don't know how long the batteries lasted after that. Buy these for your children. And they will actually play outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: JoBeth Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Kids (5 & 6) + Dad and Mom love it
customer_reviews.text: Reading all the reviews, I was worried the Lazer Tag Guns would arrive broken. So I ordered them well before Christmas unpacked them and tested all four of them. No issue... they all worked without any problems. Make sure you set the Indoor/Outdoor to the right setting. I noticed the Outdoor setting is way stronger and bounces off the walls. For your information, my Kids are 5 & 6 and they already got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Brown box. No logos, no wow factor. Complete Christmas bust
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this came in a plain brown box. Loose guns, no pictures, no wow factor, nothing. For a Christmas present, I was hoping for a much better package. I will return of it doesn't work tomorrow. By the looks of it, I got returned items and the box is gone. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris stiner

customer_reviews.title: Cool guns, they just don't work for laser tag
customer_reviews.text: These guns are so cool I really want to love them. Unfortunately they don't work for a game of laser tag. The problem is the ability of the sensors to register a hit from an opposing gun. On the weaker setting, the sensor won't register a hit unless the opponent's gun is at point blank range (just a foot or so away), while on the stronger setting the sensor registers a hit if the opposing gun is fired anywhere in the same room, regardless of where it's aimed. So my kids were super excited to play with these, but upon realizing they just don't work for playing indoors during daylight hours, they have been abandoned and never played with again...
customer_reviews.author: TCJohnny

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy Toy
customer_reviews.text: These things are as amazing as the reviews say! I was so very happy with this purchase, I knew I would be though as all the reviews I read raved on them! They are so much fun and far more realistic than most laser tag guns. The fact they take 6 batteries each is wild, but hey worth every game! Great for both indoor and outdoor use. One thing we didn't care for is how loud they are in regards to announcing your low life and such because you can't sneak up on someone! :) But nevertheless these things are fun for all ages from 5+. The whole family enjoyed playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: QueenRinda

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun but LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have already had so much fun with these. I like how well made they are and the options it gives you. I really love not having darts everywhere. I was shot it the eye with a velcro tipped dart years ago and have been extremely gun shy since. This let me get back in the game and it's been so fun. My only wish is that it had a stealth mode because it's really LOUD! The sound is truly maddening after a while...BUT it sure beats watching the kids look at a screen! If this helped you please hit helpful.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Super-fun, easy to use, share and carry -- light on the batteries.  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah --- recommended by our manny (who has a whole case of these that go in his trunk everywhere), these guns really deliver. They are just as fun as the sets in a laser tag pay-to-play venue and you don't need the vest. We now have 2 sets so the neighborhood kids can all trade off. Durable, easy to use even for smaller kids (4-5), my 8-y-o and friends love these. They've been running on their first set of batteries for over a month now - impressive! Just loud enough to be fun, but not so loud that they ruin everybody else's day in the park.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleTechMom

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if both guns worked
customer_reviews.text: We have friends who have this and my kids loved playing with them so I ordered them as a Christmas gift. They were very disappointed to find that, just like so many other posters wrote, that the blue one worked fine but the gold one didn't (or so it appears). The blue one can fire on the gold one but if the gold one fires on the blue one nothing happens. My husband is pretty handy and is going to try to fix it but if not I'll be returning them to Amazon. As of right now they are out of stock so I hope we'll be able to do an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We are having fun with these. They are easy to use and the range is really far. They seem like they are quality made from heavy-duty plastic. We've had them a few weeks and so far no problems to report. They were more expensive than some other models but I'd rather spend a bit more and get something that works. I like these so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rakovan

customer_reviews.title: Defective and too late to return or get exchange. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson for Christmas. I start shoppig in July and when we put batteries in them come December only one power pack works. Very disappointing. He was so excited only to be let down. Now because of the short return window I'm stuck with a very expensive chunk of nerd plastic. I would appreciate a replacement at the least. But no one can be contacted to address my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cat V

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as I had hoped after reading the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not as fun as I had hoped after reading the reviews. We got 2 sets. From what I understand from my husband you can't tell when you actually hit someone and it would be better according to him to have a vest for the players and a clearer target. You're not really sure if you've hit the person or not I guess. I'm hoping once we have more "outdoor" weather that I can get the boys to use them. Right now they haven't gotten ANY attention at all. I thought indoor play would be appealing too but absolutely NO interest so I think they're lacking something. I even got lots of rechargable batteries for them. I'm still hoping!
customer_reviews.author: nikki v

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my 9 year old son! He loves Nerf guns but always fears his bullets getting lost. Without bullets, he can play for hours and not have to worry. They are very durable, as you would expect from Nerf, and I like that there is no chest piece to go along with it. We owned a set like that and had a lot of problems with it. Other than the fact that each gun takes 6 batteries, I am incredibly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JArnold

customer_reviews.title: Kids love not having to pick up foam bullets!lol
customer_reviews.text: My two boys love these! One of their friends has a pair also and they're able to assemble teams when all four guns are together. With the detector up on top, the boys figured out quickly that you can cover it with your hand instead of using the shield button so we had to make a rule about that! lol They like these better than Nerf bullets because they hate picking things up and the foam bullets were all over the yard
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H.

customer_reviews.title: the kids have had so much fun we did order another set so their friends or ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (age 10) received these as a gift and she and her brother (8) have had a blast playing with them. They have indoor and outdoor options, and either 10 or 25 "hits" until end of game. The only negative is they use 6 batteries a piece. Thankfully, we haven't had to replace them yet and have had the guns for 6 months, but 12 batteries for toys can add up in expense. However, the kids have had so much fun we did order another set so their friends or my husband and I can join in on the fun! ; )
customer_reviews.author: HSommer

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Got 4 of these for my kids for Christmas. They LOVE them. Cannot believe these were made in 2008 and they don't make them any more. They are great. Really high quality build. Durable. So far, they work very well. Everyone once in a while there is a glitch where one goes into rapid fire mode and nails someone for 10 shots in a single blast but other than that they work great indoors. We have not tried them outside yet. Wish they made a little vest you could wear and tag. They'd be perfect if that was the case. Buy a ton of batteries. Each one takes 6 AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Atkins

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! We got a set as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! We got a set as a gift and then bought 3 more sets. The dads love being in the game with the kids. This is a weekend, camping, party staple. They have 2 game settings: individual, where it's every person for themself or team A/Team B. There are also 2 beam strength settings: indoor and outdoor. The indoor setting is shorter so you have to be stealthy and get up close to your adversary. You only have so many "bullets" available until you have to reload. The kids, and parents, have so much fun playing with these. I believe you can get up to 14 players.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST laser tag game!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these for my son's birthday. They have indoor/outdoor switches, two teams, or solo play. They do require a lot of batteries, but rather than spending $80 on rechargables, we just get the packs from the dollar tree for a dollar and we can power all guns for $3. So far the first sets are still going strong and we've played at least 6 times.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I like everything except the battery enclosure
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the battery enclosure. It's such a pain to have to unscrew the lid constantly to get the batteries out. A little work to make them clip/unclip without a screwdriver would make these 5 star for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, may be susceptible to breaking.
customer_reviews.text: These are a ton of fun for my kids (and me, let's be honest). My kids and their cousins played with these for hours over the holidays, I barely saw them! On two of the for guns I ordered, my kids broke the reload button within a month. Amazon exchange was no problem as usual. My kids are tough on toys so I'm not totally surprised. Overall worth its weight in gold since it keeps the kids entertained.
customer_reviews.author: GunsOfTheNavarone

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but not working from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son was so excited about buying this lazer tag toy and saved up his money to purchase this. From the very beginning one of the guns kept on malfunctioning and the other worked fine. My son could turn the gun off and on and then it would function okay for a little while, but eventually would not work again. We read other reviews saying the guns would not work from the beginning so it seems to be not a good product. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: Was fun until the reload release stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the laser tag guns. After 2 weeks. The reload button stopped working. Couldnt reload the guns anymore. Before that, it would be a 5 star. but the durability just didnt last very long.
customer_reviews.author: fong718

customer_reviews.title: Might be a great set -- IF they worked
customer_reviews.text: A Xmas gift became a big disappointment, as the gold gun became less and less able to hit the blue in the first 30 minutes of play. Now gold simply never triggers a hit on blue, even at close range, while the blue hits the gold just fine. No assistance from the company or seller yet. Aside from that Q.C. issue, they feel substantial and the sound, feedback, build and play-ability (at least initially) seemed quite good. I hope we get quick service and I have an opportunity to post an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old and all his friends love to play with it (me too, must admit). It has all the features and so provides excellent value for money. Older and younger kids love it too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 sets to give as a family Christmas present. They were on sale. A little deterred by the amount of batteries each one requires. However, we bought inexpensive batteries and they have lasted through many battles over the past 3 months. Super easy to use during the night or day and a sturdy construction. We all really love playing with them and plan to add a couple more for bigger battles!
customer_reviews.author: Maury

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My son got these for Christmas and they are just fantastic. I was afraid they'd be a bit cheesy but the performance is out of this world. They work well and are a lot of fun. I particularly like the fact that there is a shield function and and ammo counter; to me, this makes the games so much more interesting and tactical. I wish I worked in a cool office and we had them there. Honestly this is fun for kids and adults and we are having a great time running around and playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: DDCTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk - Broke after about 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets (4 guns). One broke after the fourth bout. It lost the ability to fire an infrared beam but the sound still works. Buy these in a store with an extended warranty so you can return the piece of junk when it breaks. Also, the first thing you should do on receipt is test them out. Many seem to be dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Trogdor

customer_reviews.title: So fun! For everyone in the family!
customer_reviews.text: These guns are by far the best gift! We purchased 2 sets for my son's birthday in March. His friends keep coming over to play...and they always take these outside! It's nonstop action. The cons are the large amount of battery's needed, but I purchased the Amazon pack and they are still using them after 2 months. They do not suck battery life down quickly, which is a plus and the guns work very well both inside and outside. My 3 year old can handle these just fine as welk, so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable guns
customer_reviews.text: These guns are really cool. My son loves playing with his friends with them. You don't have to worry about losing bullets since it doesn't use them. The battery last for a good amount of time. I bought these guns a while age and just haven't had the time to leave a review. So it's probably been over a year since I even bought them and the guns still work like new.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Great range at night outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Great range at night outdoors. HAve a total of 8 of them.This is the old style and much better than the new ones that use an iphone. Easily gets over 300 feet at night. Not just for kids, its like the old school photon. super durable. Had one stay outside during a rain storm for a week. blew out the water and its still going strong. The oldest ones are just over 4 years old in my collection. With use the reloader may become difficult to operate, if so a little breakfree clp or any plastic safe lube will free it up. Its usually from a build up of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Tons off fun playing with these with my 8 year old. I like that there's no projectiles, not because someone could get hurt, more due to the fact that my little girl whines when she gets hit. With laser tag, no worries about that! The guns are fun to use and responsive. Reloading is made pretty fun. Nice to have the rumble feedback on the guns, I just wish it was more feedback when you get hit. It's such a shame Nerf ended this series.
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoor or outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: For kids & the young at heart this has held up well so far! We rec'd these a few weeks ago & have been using often. We really like that they can be used indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: leenster

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the guns for a few years now. We have four children ages 3-10. They all love to play. We had two sets and bought another as a birthday gift for our youngest because when the big kids have friends over everyone wants to play. Games are fun with lots of players. One of the reload mechanisms has gotten sticky on an older him but overall they've held up well and they get used offer and not gently.
customer_reviews.author: RachelA

customer_reviews.title: hit /not hit?
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to make heads or tails of whether or not a hit actually works.. they make a lot of noise... I think it's confusing trying to figure out if the two guns are starting a game at the same time.. one of them seems to always strike the other and not visa versa.
customer_reviews.author: W. Maine

customer_reviews.title: Gold gun stops working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy these laser tag guns! Our experience was similar to many of the 1-star reviewers. The gold gun stopped working first day of use. Blue gun fires on gold gun just fine, but gold gun stopped registering hits from blue gun within a few hours of use. Also like many others, we bought these guns in October but didn’t start using them until March. So we can’t get a refund. Total garbage. Now we have two unhappy kids and we’re out $70. Clearly poor quality control at Nerf.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these taggers for almost a year and they still work like new! Play head to head or on teams if you have multiple taggers. They are very easy to switch to different modes and teams. I’d recommend just using regular batteries as they last very long given the amount of power they require for the lights, sound and recoil. My household includes adults and children who all love to play. Ok maybe not the best idea to have the little ones shooting right?
customer_reviews.author: S-H-1

customer_reviews.title: junk!
customer_reviews.text: just junk. we played ONE game and then the blue gun stopped working. we could shoot just fine but we were invincible (couldn't get shot). The settings were correct solo/outdoor/10 strength. we tried to turn the guns ON/OFF several times and we got another game to work but than the gun failed again...
customer_reviews.author: alexd

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Durable 5+ years
customer_reviews.text: We've had our sets for > or = to 5 years running now. The occasional one has broken (sensor), but mostly they have held up well. They get handled roughly all the time, even dropped on the asphalt. We have older versions with the shotgun attachment. If you can find them anymore, the attachment is great to have.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this laser tag!!
customer_reviews.text: My son (who is five) and I where at the park one day and these kids about 10-12 years old had this set, my son asked to play and they let him and I both play after spending about an hour playing this game decided to get this set. When we received them my kids where out of town but my wife and I took them for a spin inside the house. Had an absolute BLAST was about to by another set just so we would all have some just thought I would drop a review!!
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Xmas presents this year. We got a set when they were on sale for $35. Only regret is that I didn’t get 2 sets. My son who is 7 and daughter who is 4 are loving these. My son hasn’t put them down since opening them on Xmas morning. I like that there aren’t nerf pellets all over my house and that my daughter can play too. Also you can use outside and keep on expanding with more packs. Great toy! The whole family loves playing!
customer_reviews.author: Mama to lovebugs

customer_reviews.title: Legit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to try them before renting the same model for a huge youth group event. These things are legit! Despite being plastic, they have some substance to them and don't feel fragile. The range is incredible and the reload clip feature is a bonus. Not sure on how long the batteries last. Each gun takes 6 AA batteries!! 😳 Rechargeable ones are probably the best bet with these...
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are a blast! Love the way they work. You get a "temporary shield" (like 10 seconds) when you hold one of the buttons - can't shoot while shielded but can't get hit either. You have to "reload" after so many shots, which is quick, but gives you that slight sense of having to pay attention to what you're doing, not merely pulling the trigger. They also have settings for indoors or outdoors, and you can choose how many times you can get "hit" before you're out. On the downside, each one takes 6 AA batteries, but they have not needed to be replaced yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hornswith

customer_reviews.title: it's nonstoppable fun and it's awesome it comes in pack of two
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a bit pricey but it's not just a toy gun, it's nonstoppable fun and it's awesome it comes in pack of two. My 5 and 11 year old can play with it for hours, running around the house. We take it to the parks too and they run, hide and have fun playing and they attract other kids at the play ground who start chasing them and playing with them too! It's a perfect toy and no bullets, just many cool sounds. I was worried the sound will be too annoying to hear for me ( a mom ) but it's actually not just beep-beep, it has good sounds variety.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 Christmas’s ago and they still work with no problems. We bought 4 guns so kids and neighbors can play and they love it. Great for all ages!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: These are a huge hit my family. They're better than paying for laser tag at a facility. The down side is that they take around 12 batteries. I wouldn't say they "eat" batteries, though, because we're casual players, and they've had the same batteries for almost a month now. Very accurate, heavy (not cheaply made), and can hold up to rough housing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: We love these guns
customer_reviews.text: We love these guns. They are high-quality and work well. We got some of these for my sons for Christmas, and then we ended up ordering 10 more for their birthday party! Now they have a sack for the entire block They play with them all the time. These have an indoor and an outdoor setting, they also have a short game mode and long game mode. The only thing that they don't have that "professional" grade guns have is point accumulation. These guns are definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Famigletti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun - quality is great. Solid toys.
customer_reviews.text: We read the positive reviews here and chose these over some other models. Glad we did as these are really well made and work awesomely. I actually had the original lasertag back in the late 80's and they weren't great, these are like a 100 times better and they vibrate and make noises and you have to reload. They are a blast. We just bought a second set so we can have 4 person family laser tag battles!
customer_reviews.author: LivingNWLife

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun
customer_reviews.text: Packaging not for gifting out of the box. These are a blast. We play with them Indoors all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bulmer

customer_reviews.title: A bit unreliable but fun when they work.
customer_reviews.text: These are fun bot a bit fritzy. We got 6 guns 3 months ago and 2 are a bit broken. The amo reload is jammed. Also, all the guns randomly don't receive or shoot during a game. If you reboot the gun it works again. We always have to shoot each other once before we begin a round to make sure our gun is working. A bit annoying but not sure if there is a better option out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I bothered to buy any other gifts this Christmas! This is the only thing my kids have played with for the past couple of weeks...it's THAT awesome. I bought 2 sets (I have 4 kids...and a young-at-heart husband) so that everyone could play together. The instructions are very simple to understand and the gun itself is very easy to operate. Even my 4 year old got the hang of it in a matter of minutes. One helpful tip: There are two modes; Solo and Team. If you find that your shooting and hitting your opponent but it's not registering as a hit, it's because one of you has your switch toggled wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Tribe

customer_reviews.title: The guns arrived in a generic, plain cardboard box ...
customer_reviews.text: The guns arrived in a generic, plain cardboard box with no instructions or product information whatsoever and the guns had scratches on them and it was clear they were USED. Plus the guns do not work properly. I returned the first set and I demanded the original box these are supposed to come in, but yet again, Amazon sent them in a generic, plain cardboard box with clearly USED guns inside AGAIN. Amazon, shame on you!!! And now I cannot return them so we're stuck with a worthless toy.
customer_reviews.author: erin germain

customer_reviews.title: They work pretty good, sometimes it hits and sometimes it doenst
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty good, sometimes it hits and sometimes it doenst. Am surprised it being a Nerf brand. For the price the gun is heavy enough to withstand kids. Actually I just purchased the Dynasty Laser guns and they work great! But again we just got them. One thing these Nerf laser tag guns are holding up well to the treatment my 10 yr old grandson dishes out lol.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love and great for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift for my 8yr old (and my husband) He loves Nerf and I love that I don’t have a million bullets all over the place. Kids love that they don’t have to have “time outs” to reload! Win win for everyone. Going to get another set so the whole family can play. The only downside is that they are loud but honestly, who cares when we are having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: On my 2nd set and again, one of the two doesn’t work. Turns on, but with none of the effects listed. Defective. Sending back again and looking for a different product. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: If only it would work right
customer_reviews.text: My son was really excited about this gun set. However, one of the guns records a hit even when the other gun is pointing the complete other way. This makes it so only one gun ever wins. We are waiting on a replacement. Hope the next set works much better. If not, we will return for a full refund. The quality of the guns seems good and heavier duty than you would think. If only it would work right.
customer_reviews.author: AlCaSa

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. I bought this for our 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. I bought this for our 9 year old. I would much rather see him play with these then play a video game. When you move and shoot you may actually break a sweat. Using cover, hiding, and surprising opponents is more strategic than most video games. For 50.00 for a pair, it is a good value. Let me strongly suggest buying an 8 pack of rechargeable AA batteries and a charger at the same time you buy this product. You will need 6 AA batteries per Lazer Tag Gun.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiTechnoLawyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this item are spot on. This was the best Christmas gift our kids received! Our two year old enjoys it just as much as our seven year old and let’s be honest, the adults love this just as much! There are two modes, indoor and outdoor. If you use outdoor mode while inside it will “hit” the other guns through walls which can be frustrating. Once we figured out we needed to switch to indoor mode we foind it to be more fair. My best advice, buy four guns so that everyone can play, two is not enough!
customer_reviews.author: JBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Really Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for son, he loves it, one gun needs to be replaced as reload button sticks out of box, Amazon to the rescue again! Has mode for solo, or teams, can set guns to take 10 or 25 hits to get out, has an over shield button in front of trigger so you can't get hit but it doesn't last for ever so keep moving! I can see getting more of these to get outside with this summer.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerUnknown

customer_reviews.title: My boys - 8 and 10 - love running around the house and outside playing lazer tag
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased 2 sets of these! My boys - 8 and 10 - love running around the house and outside playing lazer tag! It's so much more convenient than the Nerf sets with bullets you always end up losing or end up eaten by the household pets (and less likely to poke out on eye too). The sensors work great and the sound effects make it even more entertaining. You'll even find momma bear hiding around a corner from time to time playing this fantastic game!
customer_reviews.author: Fe Z.

customer_reviews.title: these are crazy range.  my 6 year old probably went oiut 300 yards for 1 shot one kill
customer_reviews.text: crazy range. love the recoil feel and function. This is great for long distance. Need another one for the wife to join. This is great for the whole family during this Covid-19 when you cant be playing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love them. I went with the reviews and also because we have many other nerf items at home and we like their quality. Once you put the batteries on they are a bit heavy. Overall a great purchase and we are getting ready to buy another set so more friends can join!
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: The gold gun is far more accurate than the blue. Games are unfair.
customer_reviews.author: co

customer_reviews.title: Great toys.  Best for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great toys. Not much to report that you can't find in other reviews. They are solidly constructed and well designed. Very fun. They use a bunch of AA batteries, but they seem to last. Last year we bought some of the other popular laser tag guns on Amazon. Total fail. They were poorly constructed and did not work consistently. These are great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Best laser tag set ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 and 10 year old kids. They love playing with them. It brought back memories for me, when I had the original set from 25+ years ago. These work a whole lot better. You don't have to wear a separate target on your chest, and an instant game can be had at any time. I like how the clip ejects when you run out of ammo. It forces you to reload; so you don't go hog wild attacking your opponent. The laser is really accurate, and the voice assistance comes out clean. A must buy for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Chalkdust

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and have given the kids an indoor run around and chase each other toy that won't destroy anything. A very welcome alternative to nerf gun bullets! I bought two sets and they work well together. They can play solo or divide up into 2 teams. They can set the # of hits they can take until they are "dead". It has been a great addition to the house during a very cold New England winter.
customer_reviews.author: thebarrister

customer_reviews.title: Great way for a child to be active! Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought these for my then 5 year old and he still uses them a few times a month. He's 7 and likes to play these with friends or his dad in the yard. They're well made and have some weight to them. The batteries haven't been an issue. We've changed them out once since purchase. I would buy these again and I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. UGA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Indoors they are not good, I think because the infrared light is bouncing off the walls. But outdoors they work perfectly. You have to aim accurately or you will not hit the target. My whole family plays with them and the kids play with their friends. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well for a large event.
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a few reviews before buying these laser guns. We used several sets for a grad night party. The kids loved them. I was worried that they might think they were more suitable for younger kids but there were not any issues. Heavy use for about 6 straight hours and the batteries were starting to fade. I don't think you could ask for more. Be sure to tell everyone that they can not hide the guns behind their backs to avoid being hit. We will definitely be using them for our event again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Meg's mom

customer_reviews.title: An absolute blast for the whole family!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a ton of fun!!! Bought them for my kids last Christmas and they kinda threw them to the side until one day over the summer I ask about them and we figured them out. What a blast!! I ordered two more so that Mom and Dad can play too. Great exercise!! So much fun!! Love how I was able to get two more and they work with the ones we already had! Will probably get another set for when neighbor kids come over. Love how you can play solo, or as teams.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: great fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: this was a christmas gift and soooooooo much fun. well worth the price... need to order another set though so whole family can play. they have a good reach as far as distance. its like playing lazer tag for real.... indoors or outdoors. setting for indoor or outdoor play. each gun takes 6 batteries. easy install and set up. can set to 10 hits or to 25 hits before you are out.
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn cool laser tag set
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets. All four of my kids, ranging in age from 5-18, and their friends have played with these. They loved them. Confusing at first while trying to figure out buttons and meaning of beeps/sounds coming from gun, but they eventually go the hang of it. Battery lasts longer than expected. They have been played with at least 6 times at 30min to 1 hour each and have yet to change batteries. Also, a good hefty gun. Doesn't feel cheap at all. My kids have thrown it around, tossed them in toy bins, jostled them in bags. They look and work perfectly fine. Allow 5-10minutes for a learning curve and your kiddos will have a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Arian Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Tag
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. We bought 4 and use them occasionally still, after a couple of years. One disadvantage is that they each take 6 AA batteries and they go through them pretty fast. We've used others, but my boys prefer these for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Konrad

customer_reviews.title: That rare toy that gets it just right
customer_reviews.text: These Nerf laser tag guns were a big hit this Christmas -- they are a lot of fun. These laser tag guns are really great for their simplicity: there are no extra parts that you have to wear and no special targets. The targets are integrated into the guns themselves, so you're aiming your shots at your opponent's gun. The game play is simple and intuitive. These were so much fun that we picked up a second set so that we could play teams.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew FX

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE TOY
customer_reviews.text: Had to return TWICE these lazer guns. Don't buy them. The 1st time was for a Christmas present .My Grandson was SO disappointed because this is what he truly wanted. Then when the second set came both guns didn't work. Twice my grandson was upset. Returning the same type of toy 2 times for the same problem is unacceptable. I see that Amazon is out of these now so I'm thinking that I received prior defective guns that had been returned by someone else. AGAIN DON'T BUY THESE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Better indoors than outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought six of these for my kids and their friends to play. Outdoors the accuracy is meh, indoors they are loud and makes for a ruckus. They love them and they get their friends involved all the time to get them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Karie Herring

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT EVER!! Says my 6 year old son and my Husband :) These Lazer Guns are SO much fun inside and out! Had some issues with one of the guns (it was a little hard to reload). Contacted the seller and I had a new one in the mail the following day. AWESOME customer service!! I will purchase form this seller again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for our grandson's 5th birthday. Dad picked up a second set so he could play too. Everyone enjoyed from 5 years old to grandparents age. We all had fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: JLLo

customer_reviews.title: Love These Nerf Lazer Tag Guns
customer_reviews.text: These Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX guns are awesome. I gave them to my grandkids and their parents for Christmas so they can have a whole family Lazer Tag game. They love them. My order arrived quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Social distancing at it’s best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a way to keep my kids active and engaged, but outside of arms reach of each other during this Corona Virus lockdown. Can be used inside it out. So far so good!!! Keep a good supply of batteries on hand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Groskreutz

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The laser and receptors are not accurate, build quality seems good but it fail after 3-4 days. Now they don’t register hit anymore so they are just expensive sound making toy
customer_reviews.author: A Concerned Buyer

customer_reviews.title: They broke almost immediately. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these expensive guns broken after just a couple of uses. My son didn't even get to go outside and use them and they were already broken. Nobody was rough with them. Poorly made and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Carvell

customer_reviews.title: Crazy fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! A big hit for our Grandchildren. They love them and have using them every day! They are durable and fun. If I had a complaint it would be ordering limits. I was only allowed to order two sets and I have 6 grandchildren who I would have bought for. As far as the product goes... TOP NOTCH!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and feel like they will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Well made and feel like they will last a long time. They have been a blast to use! We purchased two sets so the kids could play with friends. The only downside is that it drains the 6 AA's each gun requires after a play or two. But then again, each play for our kids is about 2 hours.... They need to start making these again!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Snoo

customer_reviews.title: Best nerf guns ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best nerf guns ever! Nothing to lose. So fun at our house for ages 5-40. The first set we bought one of the guns didn't work. I bought a new set and it has no problems. I'm returning the first set, but plan to buy another one for the next birthday so we can do team play. It seems like they are available to buy intermittently, so dont count on being able to buy them at the last minute.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: 12 guns, 4 years, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: We have 12 of these and have used them off and on over the last 4 years with no problems. My son is 12 now and he and his friends still use them. They work great indoors, outdoors, in sunlight, and in darkness. We always remove the batteries when we are done so the batteries don't leak acid. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Get this toy and don't look back
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. These toys have caused great fun, laughter And adventure in our home. The batteries last FOREVER. They are sturdy, have a bunch of cool features (sounds, vibrations when you get hit, indoor/outdoor settings, etc. I will never regret getting this toy. I am Impressed with how well it's made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Randall Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my four kids as part of their Christmas gifts. They love them and so does my husband and I. We have all enjoyed them...fun for the entire family. Works great and fun. Kids ages 12, 7 and two 6.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy C.

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea there were such fun toys out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a first grader, who picked up the use of them easily. The boys ran around "shooting" each other, but there is no mess (aka choking hazards for babies) laying around after. They can play on teams or they can play solo. After watching the boys play and have so much fun, the hubby and I decided to give them a try after the kids were in bed. I can attest to you all that they are fun for all ages. We use them with eneloop rechargeable batteries and the fun is virtually unending. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Micromom

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow are these things fun! I love them as much as my kid does. I bought several of these so the cousins and neighborhood kids can join in. We have traditional nerf guns, and get tired of finding darts all over the house and lawn. Battery life is decent as long as you remember to turn off the device. I suspect these will get hard to find for this cheap as they are discontinued. I have bought a few used off of ebay and they often don't work as well as the new ones.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hart

customer_reviews.title: fun for indoor and outdoor use with no clean up afterwards
customer_reviews.text: takes 6 2AA batteries for each gun but they are fun to play with. all the features like re-loading, the shield and team play make it fun to use with 2 or 4 ppl
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 1 month
customer_reviews.text: These were by far the hit at Christmas! Bought 2 sets for my 3 boys and my husband, and we play every single day. No darts around the house, my little guy can even win (he has his strategies!). Batteries are still going. Really, I have nothing bad to say, they are worth the price! UPDATE 1/19/16: the reload triggers no longer work on 3 of the 4 guns I purchased. Less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: I'm wondering if it will get better the more they play with it
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this to my twin 7 year old boys. they are having a blast and so are the cousins. I will be getting 2 more so that when friends come over they can have a laser tag war. I gave it a 4 star only because they seem to have a hard time hitting the target on the top of the gun. I'm wondering if it will get better the more they play with it. my son was bummed that it didn't have a vest sensor like the "real lazed tag" place. oh well maybe they will add that as an accessory piece, we would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: If you grew up loving laser tag, it doesn't get much better than these
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all I can say. The technology packed into these laser tag guns is impressive. Sad that they are no longer mass produced. I would buy more if they weren't so expensive. My two eldest boys have had hours of fun with these. I have gotten in on a few games as well and game play is A+.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonhyl

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 sets and 2 of the 4 guns didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets and 2 of the 4 guns didn't work properly out of the box, no lights and didn't shoot or get tagged. Exchanged them, big mistake, all 4 worked out of the box this time but by the 3rd use one doesn't work properly (doesn't eject mag/thus no reload) and 1 seems to register tags through walls. Now it is 3 days too late to return. Save your time money and effort and just by any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome, kids and adults love them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, kids and adults love them. Work great indoors and out, but definitely more fun outside. Great range and easy to use. The LED indicators are great, it's nice being able to see your life and ammo. I have a 5 year old and a 2 1/2 year old that both love them, fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: I love that it comes as a set
customer_reviews.text: Nerf darts are a problem at my house. If the kids don't lose them, the dog tries to eat them. Laser tag is a win/win! I love that it comes as a set. Though each gun takes 6 batteries, they seem to last a long time, at least several rounds of tag. I highly recommend using rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Reload mechanism fails
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome for about 10 uses before the reload mechanism started to fail on one. Then a few games later it started to fail on the other one as well. If not for that one fatal flaw, definitely would’ve been 5 out of 5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: smcarmo

customer_reviews.title: They're a blast
customer_reviews.text: I played with these once with my younger cousins then purchased my own set of four to use with my friends, and we love them. We're all in our mid-twenties so these are great for adults too! Way cheaper than playing laser tag at a facility and no bulky vests to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Parr

product_meta.title: Nerf Official: Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX Tagger 2-pack - Fun Multiplayer Laser Tag Game for Kids & Adults, Ages 8 & Up (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingTag or be tagged in this intense, real life lazer battle game! The complete 2 player system includes 2 Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX blasters that register hits with lights, sounds and vibrations for thrilling minute to minute action! The rumble pack lets players know when they've been hit, while the recoil feature engages with every shot fired. Invite friends to join in multi player modes (additional taggers sold separately) and watch your back if you don't want to get tagged! Nerf and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy.
feature_bullets: MULTIPLAYER COMPATIBILTY – The Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX Tagger is a complete system that features 2 Phoenix LTX Lazer tag blasters for fun, action packed Lazer battles. All Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX blasters are compatible and interchangeable so more than 2 players can play at once (additional taggers sold separately). Invite friends to join in multi player mode and suddenly they are ready to battle with 3 players, 4 players, 5 players, and beyond. Play in teams or one big free for all, but remember it’s tag or be tagged
INDOOR AND OUTDOOR BATTLES – The arena can be anywhere with these Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX blasters so players can battle inside the home or spread out outside for epic match ups

FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY – Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX Lazer tag blasters are great for kids, teens, and adults alike. For ages 8 years old and up, different play settings make the game fun and easy for the whole family. Players can set their Lazer tag blasters for 10 or 25 hits before they’re out. Set beginners’ Lazer tag blasters to 25 and more advanced players’ to 10 to even the playing field. These Lazer tag blasters make the best gift for kids (boys and girls), teenagers and adults. Perfect for a birthday, Christmas and other holidays, or any occasion

CONVENIENT – The Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX Tagger game is a quality toy that’s fun for the whole family. Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX blasters use a class 1 LED, infrared light. This set requires no vest, pinnies, or ammo. That means no need for cumbersome extra clothing and there are no darts to lose. Players don’t have to stop to reload so they can stay in the game and keep in playing. And, as a bonus, no clean up. Get the benefit of our eco friendly packaging, which ships in simple brown, recyclable package that’s easy to open and frustration free

AWESOME SOUNDS & EFFECTS Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX blasters register hits with lights, sounds and vibrations. Get the authentic Lazer combat experience with a recoil every time it’s fired, a reactive vibration when you’re tagged, fun Lazer shooting sounds, and an awesome ammo reload feature

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,006 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
